scotty.database

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • scotty.database.Context
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Context>, Similarity<Context>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Database, NamedContext

    public class Context
extends Object
implements Comparable<Context>, Similarity<Context>
    A Context is a set of attributes, that can inherit attributes from its parent and contain sub-contexts within it.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface scotty.database.parser.Similarity

        DOWN_GRADE, NOT_SIMILAR, SIMILAR
